output:
  html_document: default
  pdf_document: default
  word_document: default
---
```{r}
library(xtable)
col <- sprintf("Cell %d:%%d", 1:9)
vars <- sapply(1:3, function(i) sprintf(col, i))
alt_vars <- cbind(
  Rowgrp1 = c("Mjr group 1", "", "", 
              "Mjr group 2", "", "", "", "", ""),
  Rowgrp2 = c("Group 1", "", "", 
              "Group 2", "", 
              "Group 3", "", "", ""),
  Rownames= rownames(vars), 
  vars)
colnames(alt_vars) <- gsub("
                           ", "\n", colnames(alt_vars))
# rownames(vars) <- NULL
print(xtable(alt_vars, caption="An xtable example"), type="latex", include.rownames = FALSE)
```

```{r}
library(knitr)
kable(mtcars[1:4,])
library(pander)
```
